Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: Visiting research associate - Fernand Braudel Centre, University of Binghamton
Visiting research associate Dipartimento di Ethnic Studies - University of California, Berkeley
Research associate - Centre for Social Theory, Warwick (UK)
Research associate - Institute for Indian International Relations, Delhi
Research associate - Centre for Postcolonial and Gender Studies, Università degli studi di Napoli, l’Orientale

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Relatore - 'Introduzione agli studi postcoloniali' – Napoli, SUM (Istituto Italiano di Science Umane)
Relatore - 'The Decolonial Option' - Londra, LSE
Relatore - 'Topology, Culture and Social Science' - ATACD (A Topological Approach to Cultural Dynamics) World Conference – Barcelona, UB
Relatore - 'Cultures of Change: New Perspectives on Arts and Sciences' – Barcelona, UB, Arts Santa Monica
Relatore - 'Human Redundancy: Topological Approaches to Concept Production' - Bologna, University Alma Mater
Relatore - 'Voci e silenzi postcoloniali: Assia Djebar e Frantz Fanon' - Napoli, l’Orientale
Relatore - “Bringing Capital Back in” - Postcolonial Matters – Università degli studi di Napoli, l’Orientale
Relatore - '1973. Quarant'anni dopo' - Napoli, Università l’Orientale
Relatore - 'Global Historical Sociology: Symposium' - London School of Economics, Londra
Relatore - 'Unthinking Hierarchy' – ISA (International Sociological Association), Yokohama (Japan)
Panel Chair - “The geocultural turn” - J. Nehru University, Delhi
Relatore - 'Ripensare la decolonizzazione' - Università Statale di Milano
Relatore - “Reconstructing Social Theory” - International Social Theory Consortium, Università di Cambridge (UK)
Panel Chair - IX EISA (European International Studies Association) – “Global Connectedness and the Theoretical Foundations of Post-Western IR”
Organizzatore - “Decolonizing Knowledge” – Linnaeus University and Goldsmiths College – Vaxjo (Sweden)
Keynote speaker - “Decolonizing Sociology” — Borderscapes. Napoli, l’Orientale.

Organizzatore - Explanatory Workshop on “Alternative Cosmologies and Knowledge Systems” – Institute for Research on India and International Studies (IRIIS), together with World Studies International Committee (WSIC) – Delhi
Keynote speaker - “Global Sociology and Cross-Cultural Dialogue” – South Asian University, Delhi
Relatore - 'HIstorical Sociology and International Relations' - World International Studies International Committee, Delhi
Relatore - Mediterranean Landscapes and the Transformation of Human Imagination - Viterbo, Unviersità della Tuscia

Co-fondatore - Colonial Postcolonial and Decolonial Working Group – Queen Mary University, Londra

Co-fondatore - Global Studies from the South - Delhi Group - (WISC and IRIIS)
